content.rendered:
Directed by William McGregor. Catherine Morshead. Joe Cornish.

Written by Joe Cornish. Joe Cornish. Jonathan Stroud. Ed Hime. Joy Wilkinson. Kara Smith.

Cast Cameron Chapman (Anthony Lockwood). Ali Hadji-Heshmati (George Karim). Jack Bandeira (Quill Kipps). Ivanno Jeremiah (Inspector Barnes). Rhianna Dorris (Kat Godwin). Louise Brealey (Pamela Joplin). Bronwyn James (Sergeant Wade). Paddy Holland (Bobby Vernon). Hayley Konadu (Flo Bones). Ben Crompton (Julius Winkman). Morven Christie (Penelope Fittes). Rico Vina (Ned Shaw). Luke Treadaway (Golden Blade). Jemma Moore (Annabel Ward). Ishtar Currie-Wilson (Annabel Ward). Michael Clarke (Skull). Jeff Rawle (Sebastian Saunders). Alice Lowe (Adelaide Winkman). Brendan Gibson (Bickerstaff). Nigel Planer (John Fairfax). Sharon Morgan (Mrs. Hope). Paul Thornley (Cutter). Sandra Huggett (Mrs. Carlyle). Carolyn Murray (Nurse). Andrew Woodall (Mr. Jacobs). Saskia Axten (Genevieve). Lily Nichol (Ellie). Michael Clark (Skull). Nick Julian (Winkman’s Heavy). Nina Bowers (Dani). Vanessa White-Smith (Mrs. Clarke). John Lightbody (Gravedigger Norris). Bobby Brown (Paul). Twana Omer (Abraham). Quincy Miller-Cole (Terry). Lily Newmark (Norrie White). Lucy Briers (Mrs. Harris). Erin Ainsworth (Canary). Shalini Peiris (Coroner). Benjamin/Ep Chivers (Canary). Sharlene Whyte (Chat Show Host). Amanda Abbington (Marissa Fittes). Conall Turner (Leopold Winkman). Nicola Wright (Woman at King’s Cross). Saverio Buono (Hugo Blake). Ottilie Keel (Canary). Samaran Natarajan (Samaran Pandy). Maximillian Cherry (Canary). Toby Constad (Fittes HQ Officer). Foluke Anglin (Rotwell HQ Officer). Stuart Angell (Breather). Claire Hackett (Woman at Tendy & Sons). Jethro Skinner (Jack Carver). Tommaso Di Vicenzo (Breather). Diane Spencer (Cold Maiden). Ruby Gaskell (Breather). Jordan Revell (Breather). Nicholas Tredrea (Breather). Aidan Greenberg (Mill Boy). Bobby Brown (Paul). Joseph Aston Grant (Passerby (uncredited)). Jerry Ronson (Bereaved Father (uncredited)). Callum Bowyer (Agent (uncredited)). Sue King-Spear (Giavana (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Nira Park. Rachael Prior. James Biddle. Joe Cornish. Scarlett Mulraine-Simkin. Laura Richardson. Donna Mabey.

Production Complete Fiction.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2023–)
